Streamline your business procesees with efficient online forms.Learn More Zoho Forms – An intuitive online form builderBuild online forms in minutes to collect data for applications, permits, claims, and more.No-code, drag-and-drop builder Create forms effortlessly with our intuitive no-code, drag-and-drop builder. Whether you're a novice or an expert, you can easily design and customize forms without any coding knowledge. Simply drag and drop elements to build your perfect form in minutes.Simple sharing options Distribute your forms with ease using our simple sharing options. Share your forms via email, social media, or embed them directly on your website. Reach your audience wherever they are and start collecting responses immediately.Notifications Stay informed with real-time notifications. Receive instant alerts for every form submission, ensuring you never miss important data. Customize your notification settings to keep your team updated and responsive.Customization Tailor your forms to match your brand and specific needs. With a wide range of customization options, you can modify themes, colors, fonts, and more. Create a unique look and feel for your forms that aligns with your organization's identity.Tracking Monitor your form's performance with advanced tracking features. Analyze submission rates, track respondent behavior, and gain insights into user engagement. Use this data to refine your forms and improve response rates.Security Protect your data with top-notch security features. Zoho Forms ensures that your information is safe with SSL encryption, data encryption at rest, and compliance with industry standards. Zoho Forms allows you to collect data seamlessly, reducing paperwork and the risk of errors. Effortlessly gather and manage information online, ensuring a smooth, eco-friendly workflow.Increased efficiencyStreamline your processes with Zoho Forms. Automate data collection, reduce manual entry, and speed up your workflows. Increase your team's productivity and focus on what truly matters with efficient form management.Ease of useCreating and managing forms has never been easier. Zoho Forms' intuitive interface ensures that anyone can build forms quickly, without any technical expertise. Enjoy a hassle-free experience and get your forms up and running in no time.Effective collaborationEnhance teamwork with Zoho Forms' collaboration features. Share forms with your team, set permissions, and work together in real-time. Ensure everyone is on the same page and streamline your collaborative efforts.Multiple ways to share formsZoho Forms offers various sharing options to fit your needs. Share your forms via email, social media, or embed them on your website. Reach your audience wherever they are and collect responses with ease.Reports and analyticsGain valuable insights with detailed reports and analytics. Track responses, monitor trends, and make data-driven decisions. Zoho Forms provides the tools you need to analyze your data and optimize your strategies.Frequently Asked Questions What is a form?   A form is a printed or electronic document used for data collection. A form contains numerous spaces or 'fields' in which one can write or enter data. Sharing forms is a user-friendly approach to conducting surveys, collecting information, taking orders, and more. Forms are an essential data collection tool for gathering and organizing data efficiently, whether it’s for lead generation, registrations, applications, or order processing.Online forms streamline data collection, reduce errors, and ensure that information is organized and accessible, making them vital for informed decision-making in any field. With online forms, especially those built using Zoho Forms, you can automate data capture, tailor questions to your needs, and simplify processes like customer inquiries, feedback collection, lead generation, or employee onboarding.What is a form builder?  A form builder helps you streamline data collection with ease and accuracy. Design custom forms, automate workflows, and capture responses. A form builder is an online platform, which is used for form creation. Nowadays, online form builder apps can be accessed through any device, including your mobile phone.What is a custom form creator?   A custom form creator is a data collection tool that allows you to design and build forms tailored to your unique requirements. With features like drag-and-drop fields, customizable templates, and conditional logic, you can create forms for any purpose, from customer feedback and surveys to event registrations and order forms.How do online forms streamline the data collection process?  An online form is a paperless data collection tool. You can avoid the hassle of paper or printed forms with the help of this eco-friendly alternative. By using an online data collection form, you can significantly reduce the risk of human error during the data collection process and automate multiple workflows. Zoho Forms is a free tool to create online forms.What types of forms can I create?  Online forms can be customized for different purposes. Zoho Forms offers two formats: Standard and Card forms. Standard forms display a list of fields to be filled in. They can be used for bookings, course applications, online orders, and more. ‌The newly-introduced Card form is a fluid, one field-per-page form model. Card forms are designed to be easy to scan and complete, and may be used for feedback, surveys, and order requests. Zoho Forms offers a range of form templates for different purposes.Lead generation formseCommerce formsHR formsApplication formsBusiness formsOrder formsIs my data safe and secure with online forms?  Most custom form creators like Zoho Forms implement strong security measures, including SSL encryption, data privacy compliance, and form access restrictions. Zoho Forms is also GDPR compliant, HIPAA & CCPA compliant. On top of this, Zoho Forms adheres to ISO/IEC cloud security standards, providing assurance that your data is managed and protected according to internationally recognized best practices.How to choose the best online form builder in 2024?   The best form builder for you depends on your list of requirements. Zoho Forms offers you a range of free and paid dynamic features that you can use to build and share forms, automate multiple back-end workflows, and run your business smoothly. Our updated theme builder ensures that your forms are clear and streamlined, without compromising on aesthetic appeal.Email notificationsTheme builderPayments FeaturePDF builderDocument mergeSubformIs Zoho Forms a free form builder?   Zoho Forms offers a free online form builder that allows you to design, build, and share forms for free online. With the free plan, you can create a variety of forms, like contact forms, surveys, and registration forms. You have access to advanced features, like skip logic and rules, and integrations with other Zoho applications or third-party services.Zoho Forms' free plan supports a range of payment integrations, including PayPal, Stripe, and 2Checkout. While there are limitations on form submissions and storage, the free plan is a great starting point for creating and managing basic forms at no cost—and it's much more cost effective than any other online form builder. You can also create forms using our free mobile forms app.Begin your data collection journey with Zoho FormsSign Up for Free
       
      
         
        Next Steps
        Book a DemoContact SalesRegister for Webinar

function createCookie(name,value,days) {
	if (days) {
		var date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	}
	else var expires = "";
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+";SameSite=None; Secure; domain=.zoho.com; path=/";
}

function zohoGASignupEvent() {
	try {
	  	window.ZTMData = window.ZTMData || [];
	  	window.ZTMData.push({'event' : 'eventSignup'});
	  	$zoho.salesiq.visitor.customaction('{"eventCategory":"Signup","eventAction":"forms","eventLabel":"\x2Fforms\x2F"}');
		window.pagesense = window.pagesense || [];
		window.pagesense.push(['trackEvent', 'signup']);
		window.pagesense.push(['trackActivity', 'Product', {'Product_name' : "forms"}]);
        var emailAdd = document.getElementById('email');
        var emailAddress = emailAdd.value;
        if(emailAddress) window.pagesense.push(['identifyUser', emailAddress]);
	} catch (e) {}
}

  setTimeout(function() {
    
    function getCookie(cname) {
  	  var name = cname + "=";
  	  var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
  	  var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
  	  for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
  	    var c = ca[i];
  	    while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
  	      c = c.substring(1);
  	    }
  	    if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
  	      return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
  	    }
  	  }
  	  return "";
  	}
    
    function removequote(a) {
      if (a.indexOf('"') > -1) {
      	var quotes = a.replace(/"/g,'');
      	return encodeURIComponent(quotes);
      } else { return encodeURIComponent(a); }
    }
    
    var markrefurl = removequote('\x22https\x3A\x2F\x2Fwww.zoho.com\x2Fforms\x2F\x3Fcampaignid\x3D22356223675\x26adgroup\x3D176257410643\x26keyword\x3Dcreate\x2520a\x2520form\x26matchtype\x3De\x26device\x3Dc\x26network\x3Dg\x26adposition\x3D\x26placement\x3D\x26gad_source\x3D1\x26gad_campaignid\x3D22356223675\x26gbraid\x3D0AAAAACg12AvYfxbxAxAu3dJaX0Hy3MSxw\x26gclid\x3DCjwKCAiAraXJBhBJEiwAjz7MZRlHuRRVKglX_KJLqfkQoiKP4SvRG8brBdtAV7Q\x2DAx6I3OoQTxyweBoCUOIQAvD_BwE\x22');
    var mark_cook = removequote('\x22adwords\x3Aforms\x7Cadwords\x3Aforms\x7Cadwords\x3Aforms\x22');
    var uuid = getCookie('zohocares-_uuid');
    uuid = removequote(uuid);
    
    function createCookie(name,value,days) {
      if (days) {
      var date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
      }
      else var expires = "";
      document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; SameSite=None; Secure;domain=.zoho.com; path=/";
    }
    
    //createCookie("cookie-uid",'"'+uuid+'"');
    var payRef = getCookie('PaymentsReferral'); 
    var catSN = getCookie('catalystZMR');
    catSN = removequote(catSN);
    
    var markinfo;
      if ((payRef == "" || payRef == "null" || payRef == "undefined") && (catSN == "" || catSN == "null" || catSN == "undefined")) {
          markinfo = "ZohoMarkRef=" + markrefurl + "&ZohoMarkSrc=" + mark_cook + "&cookie-uid=" + uuid;
      } else if (payRef != "" && (catSN == "" || catSN == "null" || catSN == "undefined")) {
          markinfo = "ZohoMarkRef=" + markrefurl + "&ZohoMarkSrc=" + mark_cook + "&cookie-uid=" + uuid + "&payRef=" + payRef;
      } else if (catSN != "" && (payRef == "" || payRef == "null" || payRef == "undefined")) {
          markinfo = "ZohoMarkRef=" + markrefurl + "&ZohoMarkSrc=" + mark_cook + "&cookie-uid=" + uuid + "&catalystZMR=" + catSN;
      } else {
          markinfo = "ZohoMarkRef=" + markrefurl + "&ZohoMarkSrc=" + mark_cook + "&cookie-uid=" + uuid + "&payRef=" + payRef + "&catalystZMR=" + catSN;
      }

    /*var markinfo;
      if (catSN == "" || catSN == "null" || catSN == "undefined") {
          markinfo = "ZohoMarkRef=" + markrefurl + "&ZohoMarkSrc=" + mark_cook + "&cookie-uid=" + uuid;
      } else {
          markinfo = "ZohoMarkRef=" + markrefurl + "&ZohoMarkSrc=" + mark_cook + "&cookie-uid=" + uuid + "&catalystZMR=" + catSN;
      }*/
    
    var zohoDomains = ['www.zoho.in', 'www.zoho.eu', 'www.zoho.jp', 'www.zoho.com.au', 'www.zohocloud.ca'];
